General_Description: '''Forced Acquisition''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Sparta]] needs the land where the [[Daughters of Artemis]] live to expend ''[sic]'' their territory." – [[Nation Leader|Leader]] of (region)
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and slew a number of the Daughters of Artemis in the region, gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the name [[Savage Requisition]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
